Package de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.fsm

Class AbstractFiniteStateMachine

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.ai.AIAlgorithm<Npc>
de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.fsm.AbstractFiniteStateMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionFiniteStateMachine, EnemyFSM, EventFiniteStateMachine, QuestFiniteStateMachine
public abstract class AbstractFiniteStateMachine
extends AIAlgorithm<Npc>
Abstract class for the state machine. Includes all important standard features of a normal state machine
Author:
Christoph Weidner

    • update

      public void update​(float deltaTime)
      Executes the actions of the state machine. If state changed -> init new state and leav old one else -> execute current state.
      Specified by:
      update in class AIAlgorithm<Npc>
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - time since last update
